education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering: Computer Science & Engineering
education.institution: Bapuji Institute of Engineering And Technology

summary: I am a Computer Science Engineer passionate about building scalable software and AI solutions. With a strong foundation in data structures, algorithms, and full-stack development, I enjoy solving complex problems from first principles. I specialize in machine learning, data-driven applications, and modern web technologies, always striving for code quality and performance.

projects.title: Fake News Detection System
projects.description: Built an end-to-end system to classify news articles as real or fake using NLP and deep learning models. Implemented text preprocessing and feature extraction. Integrated a React-based frontend to allow users to submit and analyze content. Focused on real-world applicability.

projects.title: Library Management System
projects.description: Developed a full-stack web application to manage books and users. Implemented user authentication, profile management, and CRUD operations. Designed MongoDB schemas and RESTful routes. Built server-rendered views for structured UI flow.

projects.title: Leukemia Classification Model
projects.description: Designed a deep learning model to classify and grade leukemia using metaheuristic optimization techniques to improve accuracy. Conducted experiments and documented findings in IEEE format. Focused on ML in healthcare.

projects.title: Sentinel: Network Threat Detection
projects.description: Designed an adaptive firewall dashboard for real-time threat detection using heuristic AI scoring. Built a packet-scoring engine assessing request velocity and behavior. Achieved sub-50ms latency and 98% detection of simulated attacks. Features live traffic visualization.

projects.title: Pulse Chat
projects.description: Designed a scalable real-time chat system using WebSockets for low-latency communication. Implemented hybrid architecture separating REST auth from Socket.io. Built secure auth with BCrypt. Ensured message persistence with MongoDB.

certifications: Cyber Guru in Cyber Defence — IITJ TISC
MongoDB Python Developer Path — MongoDB University
